description:
when I tried to attach volume, it wants integer as volume_id

nova volume-attach 941f7e7b-a9d8-4d0a-b81e-b952a4904a91 bbd81e81-1bcd-46fb-a2f2-aeb0aeeb30a8 /dev/vdb
usage: nova volume-attach <server> <volume> <device>
error: argument <volume>: invalid int value: 'bbd81e81-1bcd-46fb-a2f2-aeb0aeeb30a8'
Try 'nova help volume-attach' for more information.

But there is no other values to type as volume_id

I use devstack installation.

Thanks
title: nova client requied interger as volume ID

comments.content: Fixed.  Seems like I've used not fresh version of nova code.
